description: Famous for its saffron, Città della Pieve is also well worth a visit to admire the Baciadonne alley (“one of the narrowest streets in Italy”) in its beautiful historic centre. This welcoming restaurant in a quiet and elegant hotel boasts an attractive veranda for summer dining that provides the perfect backdrop for delicious cuisine that is influenced by Umbria and Tuscany alike.
